pullRequest.title: bug1846565 - JSS: Extensions in CertificateExtensions class could get…
pullRequest.bodyText:
… out of order and cause signature discrepency
This patch replaces Hashtable with LinkedHashMap to ensure order of
extensions.
https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1846565

nodes.bodyText:
Any reason why we are returning a Vector? Can we reuse the getName() method? Like this?
return getNames();

Why not use Collections class to convert to Enumeration?
return Collections.enumeration(map.values());

commit.message:
bug1846565 - JSS: Extensions in CertificateExtensions class could get out of order and cause signature discrepency

This patch replaces Hashtable with LinkedHashMap to ensure order of
extensions.

https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1846565
